name: IML
short_description: IML is a xml-based language for creating graphical user interfaces using the qt framework. It was created to make qt development faster and simpler, while still harnessing the full power of qt. This, of course, would not be possible using only a markup language, so IML has been scripted to work with python, and take its usage even further.
summary: An xml-based language for qt gui development.
